name: 蕭名宏
objective: 1.布林代數與邏輯閘  2.組合邏輯  3.同步循序邏輯  4.同步循序設計  5.非同步循序邏輯  6.非同步循序設計
schedule:
週次1. Introductory Concepts
週次2至3. Number Systems and Codes
週次4至5. Describing Logic Circuits
週次6至7. Combinational Logic Circuits
週次8至9. Flip-Flops and Related Devices
週次10至11. Digital Arithmetic: Operations and Circuits
週次12至13. Counters and Registers
週次14. Integrated-Circuit Logic Families
週次15. MSI Logic Circuits
週次16.Interfacing with the Analog World
週次17.Memory Devices
scorePolicy: 課堂表現30%,期中考30%,期末考40%
materials: Digital System, by Ronald J. Tocci, 第十版, 新月書局
